ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to send message to group I am a member of
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, My account became deregistered and I went ahead and reregistered it without issue. However now I am unable to send to the group I was a member of. I can list the group fine with `curl -X GET -H "Content-Type: application/json" 'http://127.0.0.1:8080/v1/groups/+10000000000'` returns `[{"name":"group1 Notifications","id":"group.77777777777777777777777777777777","internal_id":"11111111111111==","members":["+10000000000","+11111111111","+12222222222","+13333333333"],"blocked":false,"pending_invites":[],"pending_requests":[],"invite_link":""}]` When I use the group id above, the call always returns "null" ``` curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"message": "Ignore test", "number": "+10000000000", "recipients": ["group.77777777777777777777777777777777"]}' 'http://127.0.0.1:8080/v2/send' ``` `null` In the logs it looks like both the GET and POST calls are getting 20x response ``` [GIN] 2021/02/12 - 03:03:48 | 200 | 160.107Âµs | 10.42.1.1 | GET "/v1/about" [GIN] 2021/02/12 - 03:03:56 | 201 | 7.721459399s | 10.42.1.1 | POST "/v2/send" ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Some endpoints return "null" although successful see #91
Some endpoints return "null" although successful see #91
